unlekker.modelbuilder
Class UQuad

java.lang.Object
  unlekker.modelbuilder.UFace
      unlekker.modelbuilder.UQuad
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Comparable<UFace>, processing.core.PConstants, UConstants
public class UQuad
extends UFace
implements UConstants

Stores information about quad geometry. Primarily intended to be a support class for UGeometry and UQuadStrip Stores vertices in the same order as a quad strip does: 0 == Bottom left, 1 == top left, 2 == bottom right, 3 == top right.

Author:
marius
